attributes.action: Use the CCTV system to reward citizens who do good things as well as catch criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citizens are recorded on average 30 times a day on camera, yet people are still afraid to help those who are in trouble, or who need assistance believeing that 'someone' else will do it. Lets use the network of CCTV cameras, where possible, to reward people who help others. At the moment it's all stick and no carrot. If Crime doesn't pay, then maybe true 'citizenship' should.
